author: Kristen V. Brown and Justin Sink / Bloomberg
title: Trump’s Comment on Disinfectant Prompts Experts to Warn Against Inhaling Bleaching to Kill Coronavirus
description: "Inhaling chlorine bleach would be absolutely the worst thing for the lungs."
content:
The coronavirus doesn’t last as long on door handles and other nonporous surfaces when it’s exposed to sunlight, higher temperatures and humidity, according to a U.S. government study.
“The virus is dying at a much more rapid pace” from exposure to humidity … [+5454 chars]
